issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Database/Schema
components.description: Issues related to support for multiple Datasbases/Schemas

fields.description:
The upgrade script for HIVE-5700 creates an UDF with language 'plpgsql',
which is available by default only for Postgres 9.2+.

For older Postgres versions, the language must be explicitly created,
otherwise schematool fails with the error:
{code}
Error: ERROR: language "plpgsql" does not exist
  Hint: Use CREATE LANGUAGE to load the language into the database. (state=42704,code=0)
{code}

comments.body:
Patch adds a command line option to schematool to specify that the language should be explicitly created:
  "-dbOpts postgres.filter.pre.9"
Makes sense. I think that long term we might want to annotate specific commands with "-- IGNORE FAILURE" and then process the file statement by statement.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12673282/HIVE-8374.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12673282

Instead of having the user supply an option dependent on Postgres version, changed to the patch to automatically run a "pre-upgrade" script that creates the language, but any error is ignored.

Kept the dbOpts option as that is useful when we add any db specific options.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12674279
Thank you Mohit! I really appreciate the work done here to improve this framework! Committed to trunk,.
[~hagleitn] is this ok to backport to 0.14.1?
Yes, I think this should be backported to 0.14.1. [~sershe] can you do the honors?

bq.  Kept the dbOpts option as that is useful when we add any db specific options.

Does dbOpts need to be documented, or is it for future use?  Any other documentation, or is this just a bug fix?

* [Hive Schema Tool | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Hive+Schema+Tool#HiveSchemaTool-TheHiveSchemaTool]

bq.  document it when we add options for this arg

Agreed.  Thanks [~mohitsabharwal].

Edit (19/May/17):  The problem with that approach is that the option never got documented.  So I've added a TODOC1.0 label.  Here's where the doc belongs:

* [Hive Schema Tool -- The schematool Command | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Hive+Schema+Tool#HiveSchemaTool-TheschematoolCommand]

Some new options are being added in 3.0.0 by HIVE-1010, so I'll add a note there asking to include this doc.
Updating release version for jiras resolved in 1.0.0 .
This issue has been fixed in Apache Hive 1.0.0. If there is any issue with the fix, please open a new jira to address it.
